languages.english-overview:
WeBid is an open-source auction script written in the popular language PHP which a massive collection of inbuilt features WeBid is the prefect chose for setting up any auction site.
WeBid has an easy to use administration panel and a user friendly installation process, which allows you to have your own auction site set up in minutes.
WeBid is released under the GNU/GPL license.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
